issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

projectCategory.description: Titanium and related SDKs used in application development
projectCategory.name: Client

resolution.description: A fix for this issue is checked into the tree and tested.
resolution.name: Fixed

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.
status.name: Resolved

fields.description:
I have reproduced the error again. I donÂ´t know the reason, this is my log. Its seems all its ok. Any ideas?
Thanks in advance.

comments.body: [~sdarda] I've ran into this issue too, as a workaround delete your {{build}} folder and re-build your project. I'll create a PR.
There has been no luck. Same error in several simulators and device.
